name: rollup-plugin-azoth
description: Plugin to run azoth compiler as part of rollup build

scripts.test: npm run inline-test && npm run bundled-test
scripts.bundled-test: rollup -c bundled-test/rollup.config.js && cmp -b bundled-test/azoth-compiled.js bundled-test/azoth-compiled.snapshot.js  && cmp -b bundled-test/templates.html bundled-test/templates.snapshot.html
scripts.update-bundled-snapshot: cp bundled-test/azoth-compiled.js bundled-test/azoth-compiled.snapshot.js && cp bundled-test/templates.html bundled-test/templates.snapshot.html
scripts.update-compiler: npm un azoth-compiler -S && npm i azoth-compiler -S && git commit -am 'update compiler' && npm version patch

author: Marty Nelson <marty@martypdx.com>
